title: Delicious Burger
description: Juicy beef burger served with fresh lettuce, tomatoes, and a special sauce.

title: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic Margherita pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil leaves.

title: Creamy Fettuccine Alfredo
description: Rich and creamy Alfredo sauce tossed with fettuccine pasta and garnished with Parmesan.

title: Grilled Salmon
description: Grilled salmon fillet seasoned with herbs and served with steamed vegetables.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
description: Assorted vegetables stir-fried in a savory sauce, served with steamed rice.

title: Chicken Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce, grilled chicken, croutons, and Caesar dressing.

title: Cheese Platter
description: Assortment of fine cheeses, served with crackers, fruits, and nuts.

title: Tiramisu
description: Classic Italian dessert with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cheese.

title: Fruit Smoothie
description: Refreshing blend of fresh fruits, yogurt, and ice.

title: Steak with Red Wine Sauce
description: Tender steak cooked to perfection, topped with a rich red wine reduction sauce.

title: Vegetable Lasagna
description: Layers of pasta, tomato sauce, ricotta cheese, and mixed vegetables.

title: Sushi Platter
description: Assortment of fresh sushi rolls, nigiri, and sashimi.
